articles.title: Kim Jong Un Looks round Construction Site of Children's Hospital Near Completion
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Looks round Construction Site of Children's Hospital Near Completion
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, went round the construction site of the Children's Hospital near completion.
					 Going round different places of the hospital, he learned in detail about its construction and installation of medical equipment.
					
					 He looked round with satisfaction various treatment rooms.
					
					 He took measures to fully ensure the conditions of the room of intensive treatment and indicated concrete ways for putting the operation rooms on a sterilized and dust-free basis.
					
					 Noting designing, construction and building materials are the three main factors in erecting a structure, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that a hospital to be proud of before the world has been built as it was excellently designed under the guidance of the party, an able unit undertook its project and it was finished with good building materials.
					
					 The hospital has also taken on splendid looks as a specialized one like the recently built Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital and Dental Hospital, he said, adding it is a hospital demonstrating the validity of the public health policy of the WPK and the advantages of the socialist healthcare system in the country.
					
					 He personally named it "Okryu Children's Hospital" as it is situated in the area of Munsu where the clean water of the River Taedong flows.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Song Thaek, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, and Pak Chun Hong, Ma Won Chun and Ho Hwan Chol, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from AP President and CEO
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from AP President and CEO
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the president and CEO of the Associated Press staying here.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned by President and CEO Gary Pruitt on Saturday.

articles.title: AP Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
AP Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Associated Press headed by President and CEO Gary Pruitt flew back home on Saturday.
					 It was seen off at the airport by Chon Il, vice director general of the Korean Central News Agency.

articles.title: Officials Visit New Flats of Sportspersons Familiesã€€
articles.content:
Officials Visit New Flats of Sportspersons Families
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Members of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission Saturday visited sportspersons families who moved to new flats provided under the deep care of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Members of the commission and officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions visited new flats of families of sportspersons including marathoner Kim Kum Ok, weightlifter Kim Un Guk, gymnast Ri Se Gwang and chief coach Kim Il Song of the April 25 Sports Team, weightlifter Om Yun Chol of the Amnokgang Sports Team and yudoist Sol Kyong of the Sports Team of Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering.
					
					 They went round the interior of the peculiarly built flats and were impressed to see well-furnished living rooms, kitchens, washrooms, stores, etc. 
					
					 They handed daily necessities to the families of sportspersons, sharing joy with them.
					
					 They told the sportspersons to give fuller play to the might of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea by winning gold medals in international games in the future and thus encourage all the service personnel and people dynamically advancing towards a final victory in the building of a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae and Different Parts of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae and Different Parts of Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Institute for Foreign Policy and Strategic Studies of Vietnam headed by Director General Hoang Anh Tuan visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests looked round historic relics preserved at the old home of the President in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and his family members.
					
					 They went round historic sites on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said:
					
					 Born in a low thatch-roofed house in Mangyongdae, Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of the revolution in his teens.
					
					 He devoted his all to the struggles for freedom and liberation of the people.
					
					 The exploits performed by him will shine forever.
					
					 He provided together with President Ho Chi Minh the friendly relations between Vietnam and the DPRK.
					
					 The delegation also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition, the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace and others.

articles.title: Sportspersons Distributed with New Housing Flats
articles.content:
Sportspersons Distributed with New Housing Flats
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A new dwelling apartment for sportspersons was built on the bank of the Pothong River in Pyongyang.
					 The 27-storied apartment is well harmonized with monumental buildings, including the People's Palace of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium located across the river.
					
					 Its exterior is decorated in a peculiar way to suit the emotional feelings of sportspersons.
					
					 The four-room flat is furnished with 19 kinds of quality furniture, kitchen utensils, water heater and air-conditioner.
					
					 The apartment houses a clinic, a restaurant and a laundry in its first floor and underground.
					
					 Constructors had finished its building in less than 5 months after its groundbreaking, encouraged by the loving care shown by the Workers' Party of Korea for the sportspersons, who glorify the nation's honor in international tournaments.
					
					 They had applied a series of new construction methods and went on working even in rainy season, rounding off the building as scheduled.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, an official of the construction command, told KCNA:
					
					 "I feel a great honor and pride as being a constructor in the look of the sportspersons and their families, who are rejoiced over having moved to these new flats.
					
					 I'll devote myself to building modern housing flats, which would contribute to bettering the people's livelihood."

articles.title: Agro-technological Inventions Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
Agro-technological Inventions Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Agro-technological Inventions Exhibition opened in the capital city of Pyongyang, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, one of those projects to put the agricultural production on a new scientific basis.
					 The exhibition, located in Taesong District, features agro-chemical products, varieties of veterinary medicines and livestock feed additives which were made with domestic raw materials. Also on exhibition are farm machines and implements, experimental apparatuses, books on agricultural science and technologies, etc. 
					
					 What draws attention from visitors are nano germicide, nano bio-growth stimulants, microbial herbicide and BT biological agrochemicals developed on the basis of advanced technologies. 
					
					 The exhibition will help apply the advanced agro-technologies to farms and relevant factories.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Gives Impetus to Korea's Reunification Movement
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Gives Impetus to Korea's Reunification Movement
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- It has been six years since the inter-Korean declaration was adopted at the North-South Summit held in Pyongyang on October 4.
					 The adoption of the October 4 Declaration marked a milestone in materializing the June 15 Joint Declaration which serves as a program for national reunification.
					
					 Its adoption had led to heyday for independent national reunification.
					
					In line with the declaration, a wave of dialogues were held among politicians, businessmen, artistes and literary and academic men in the north and the south, aimed at improving cooperation and exchange.
					
					 Colorful events took place throughout south Korea in support of the adoption of the October 4 Declaration.
					
					 Pro-reunification organizations in the north, south and abroad, including the North and South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a series of statements supporting the declaration.
					
					 South Korea's media highlighted the inter-Korean cooperation, describing the declaration as a cornerstone for ensuring peace in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					But the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors totally denied the inter-Korean declarations, branding the years of implementing them as a "lost decade".  
					
					 Calling them "outcome of north's strategy towards the south", the group slandered the idea of "By our nation itself" as "narrow-minded nationalism" and "exclusive nationalism", totally laying check bars on all kinds of reunification-related events.
					
					 They also abandoned all collaborations which had been underway between the north and the south.
					
					 The present south Korean ruling quarters have now driven to bankruptcy the inter-Korean relations that has been put on its track, sticking to "confrontation accompanied with dialogue".
					
					 The past six-year-long history clearly indicates that the principles for the improvement of inter-Korean relations lie in implementing the declarations.
					
					 The Korean people's desire for independent reunification and peaceful prosperity can never be realized, as long as those sycophantic traitors remain in power in south Korea.
					
					 Should the Pak Geun Hye group persist in confrontation with the fellow countrymen as its predecessor did, they will face a deadly punishment of history.

articles.title: Premier Soccer Matches Go on in DPRK
articles.content:
Premier Soccer Matches Go on in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Premier soccer matches for the DPRK Championships are going on at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang.
					 The Hwaebul Team beat the Wolmido Team 3:0 and the April 25 Team defeated the Amnokgang Team 1:0 in men's events held on Friday.
					
					 The April 25 Team won the Kalmaegi Team 2:0 and the Chongchongang Team drew with the Hwangryongsan Team 2:2 in women's events held on the same day.
					
					 On Saturday, the Myohyangsan Team edged out the Pyongyang Team 4:2, while the match between the Sobaeksu Team and the Mangyongbong Team ended with no goal.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Respecting and Implementing North-South Declarations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Respecting and Implementing North-South Declarations
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The anti-reunification forces at home and abroad are becoming evermore desperate in their moves to block north-south dialogue and the process to improve the  inter-Korean relations but with nothing can they shake the firm faith of all Koreans in independent reunification and peace and prosperity, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The only way of turning the inter-Korean relations into compatriotic ones meeting the common interests of the nation and helpful to the country's reunification while promoting harmony of fellow countrymen is to respect and thoroughly implement the north-south declarations. 
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration clarifies the fundamental stand and principles to be adhered to by the Korean nation in settling the issue of the country's reunification.
					
					 It has been already proved by history that the Korean nation can weather any difficulties if it subordinates everything to the great objective of national reunification from the stand of giving priority to the nation and attaching importance to it and promoting its unity irrespective of ideology and social system.
					
					 The publication of the historic October 4 declaration made clearer the orientation of the development of the inter-Korean relations based on the idea of "By our nation itself" and provided the Koreans with a bright prospect for achieving peace and the reunification of the country by their own efforts.
					
					 However, the efforts of the DPRK to implement the north-south declarations have faced a stumbling block due to the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad.
					
					 The "theory of principle" unilaterally touted by the south Korean puppet group is no more than the one of confrontation against reunification as it is intended  to scrap the above-said declarations.
					
					 Such reckless acts as to do harm to the declarations are nothing but heinous anti-reunification ones of violating even elementary faith and ethics towards compatriots.
					
					 The vicious moves of the puppet group to make the great programmes for reunification common to the nation scapegoats for escalating the confrontation with compatriots clearly shows who opposes peace and reunification and pursues confrontation and war in this land.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's Moves to Scrap North-South Declarations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's Moves to Scrap North-South Declarations
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime recently examined and worked out "the second principal plan for the development of the south-north relations". It calls for deleting the plans of the previous regime for settling the pending issues between the north and the south of Korea through dialogue and negotiations and "leading the north to changes through a balanced promotion of security, exchange and cooperation". And these points are laid down as "goals of the policy towards the north" to be pursued in the 5 years to come.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary:
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime talked about "confidence" and "cooperation" while describing its military confrontation campaign being staged under the pretext of "security" as the one for defending "peace". This is an unpardonable provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the regime deleted all the points specified in the October 4 declaration such as establishing a special zone for peace and cooperation in the West Sea of Korea and pushing ahead with the establishment of a lasting peace mechanism, etc.
					
					 It is an unpardonable anti-reunification and treacherous action to refuse to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the reunification programmes common to the nation.
					
					 The plan of the regime is nothing but an anti-reunification document and a scenario for the confrontation of the social systems in the north and the south from A to Z as it is aimed at scrapping the above declarations and more desperately stepping up the moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is the only way of improving the north-south relations and achieving the common prosperity of the Korean nation to respect and implement the said declarations.
					
					 It is the height of impudence and an unpardonable mockery of the people for the regime to talk about "the development of the south-north ties" while wantonly violating the October 4 declaration. 
					
					 It would be well advised to bear in mind that the confrontation between the north and the south will bring nothing but a war and it is fated to meet a miserable self-destruction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Authorities for Introducing U.S. Nuclear Carrier
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Authorities for Introducing U.S. Nuclear Carrier
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- As already reported, the south Korean puppet forces are mulling staging joint naval maneuvers in the East Sea of Korea with the U.S. nuclear carrier George Washington involved.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary:
					
					 The projected large-scale saber-rattling targeted on the DPRK is a dangerous move to vitiate the atmosphere of dialogue and peace and bring the situation to the worst confrontational phase again. 
					
					 The ulterior motive of the south Korean puppet forces is to completely stem the trend of the detente created thanks to the DPRK's positive efforts for dialogue and peace and throw the inter-Korean relations into an abyss of confrontation and catastrophe again.
					
					 It has become clear to everybody now why the north-south dialogue and cooperation are facing such repeated difficulties and trials and why the DPRK's efforts to improve the relations fail to yield good results.
					
					 All this is entirely attributable to the U.S., the arch criminal disturbing dialogue and peace and escalating the confrontation and tension and its lackeys the puppet conservative group of south Korea hell bent on escalating the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet forces' adventurous nuclear war moves against the DPRK will inevitably entail uncontrollable catastrophic consequences.
					
					 The DPRK sets store by dialogue and peace but it will never remain a passive onlooker to the prevailing serious situation where the puppet authorities together with their U.S. master perpetrate military provocations and pose undisguised nuclear threat to it.
					
					 The DPRK is ready for both dialogue and war. It will strongly react to the nuclear war moves of the warmongers at home and abroad.
					
					 The puppet forces would be well advised to clearly understand the will of the DPRK and stop running riot.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands Immediate Dismantlement of "UN Command"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands Immediate Dismantlement of "UN Command"
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The "UN Command" should be immediately dismantled as it is a war mechanism  cooked up by the U.S. in the past Korean war to introduce armed forces of its allies and establish a command over them, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article. 
					 Referring in detail to the illegality of the setting up of the "UN Command" and the urgent need to dismantle it, the article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is now working hard to turn the "UN Command" into a "multi-national coalition mechanism" and use it as a parent body of NATO of Asian version, pursuant to its new defense strategy. 
					
					 Lurking behind Washington's move to revive the function of the "UN Command" is its strategic scenario to retain a firm grip on south Korea as an outpost for dominating the Asia-Pacific region under the changed situation. 
					
					 The United Nations today is no longer what used to be in the 1950s when the U.S. could cook up the "UN Command" as it pleased. Independence has now become a main tendency and an irresistible trend of the present times. 
					
					 There is the flag of the UN in Panmunjom even now. This is shame on the UN as it is an anachronistic product. 
					
					 The "UN Command" should be dismantled at once in order to regain the UN authority and impartiality. 
					
					 The "UN Command" is still preserved and is about to be revived as a war machine for multi-national forces. This is the matter which should not be overlooked for the purpose of ensuring security in the Asia-Pacific region including the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The U.S. should lend an ear to the just voices of the international community and dismantle the "UN Command" without delay.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Urged to Clearly Understand DPRK's Criticism and Warnings
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Urged to Clearly Understand DPRK's Criticism and Warnings
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued the following statement on Saturday:
					 As already reported, the spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission released a statement sternly warning Park Geun Hye and her party to behave with discretion as regards their unprecedented moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK and ignite a war against it in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 This is just criticism of the puppet group driving the inter-Korean relations into catastrophe again though they had reached a phase of dialogue thanks to much effort and a due warning to put the prevailing situation under control.
					
					 Had Park and her group have a reasonable way of thinking even a bit, they would have lent an ear to the profound meaning of criticism and warnings made by the DPRK and behaved with discretion.
					
					 However, the group, far from pondering over this, let the spokesman for the Ministry of Unification make public "a statement" slandering the advice.
					
					 Fining fault with what the DPRK said what it should do to Park, the group termed it "an unreasonable behavior bereft of elementary courtesy", raising a hue and cry over "spirit of mutual respect", "polite demeanor" and the like.
					
					 The group should reflect on its wrongdoings before talking about "courtesy" and "politeness." Is it "courtesy", "polite demeanor" and "spirit of mutual reciprocity" to deny the dignity of the supreme leadership and social system of the other party and escalate confrontation while letting loose a whole string of invectives against it?
					
					 Park is taking the lead in trumpeting about "unification under liberal democracy", slandering the social system of the dignified DPRK and letting her yes men, reptile media, experts and even human scum do harm to its social system and making much fuss to disturb the world. This is the reality of south Korea.
					
					 The group has no face to talk about "mutual respect" while totally denying the other party and crying out for confronting with its social system and overthrowing its regime. The group has gone the lengths of taking issue with the DPRK's politics of love for the people and the true picture of the harmonious whole. This is an uncivilized and immoral behavior hard to find in any part of in the world.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, a politician, must have known about it very well.
					
					 She should have opened her mouth, well aware of what consequences were to be entailed by her evil remarks rattling the nerves of the dialogue partner.
					
					 It is unpardonable provocation and unbearable mockery of the DPRK that such depraved villains bereft of elementary common sense and etiquette in the inter-Korean relations are talking about "courtesy," "unreasonable behavior" and the like.
					
					 Great irony is that Park and her group claimed as if they were trying to "make efforts to build confidence step by step" through dialogue and cooperation.
					
					 What Park has done after taking office is nothing but confrontation and war moves she has stepped up under the signboard of "confidence", deepening the mistrust between the north and the south.
					
					 It is none other than Park and her group who openly worked out the "principal plan for the development of the south-north relations" in which she scrapped the inter-Korean declarations, a landmark for reunification common to the nation, and officially declared the confrontation of the social systems.
					
					 It is again the puppet regime which insulted the DPRK by describing the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone, an offspring of the June 15 era, as someone's "source of money making," and worked out a sinister scenario to introduce U.S. special force into the zone, making much fuss about the "incident of detention," "rescue of hostages."
					
					 It is none other than the regime that scuttled the six rounds of the talks for reopening the Kaesong Industrial Zone, which were arranged by the positive efforts of the DPRK, by setting absurd preconditions.
					
					 The regime, obsessed with the confrontation with compatriots, checked the resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang, a cooperative undertaking common to the Korean nation, under the pretext of banning "source of money making" of the DPRK. The regime went so brazen-faced enough as to describe the reunion of the separated families and relatives from the north and the south of Korea, that was arranged with much effort, as the fruition of south Korea's "theory of principle", abusing it for escalating the confrontation. The reunion, therefore, proved abortive.
					
					 The war-like forces' moves to unleash a nuclear war against the DPRK, in particular, have reached an extremely reckless phase.
					
					 Madcap south Korea-U.S. joint nuclear war exercises targeting the DPRK are being staged in south Korea even at this moment and massive nuclear strike means, including a nuclear carrier of the U.S., are being transported through the sky, land and sea to be deployed in south Korea.
					
					 A few days ago, south Korea and its American master held a military confab and worked out and officially announced the "tailored deterrence strategy" aimed at mounting preemptive nuclear attacks on the DPRK.
					
					 Park and her regime only deepens the feelings of antagonism, confrontation and distrust through the racket for escalating stand-off and igniting a war, not building confidence step by step through dialogue and cooperation. 
					
					 This is the truth of the "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" about which the Park group talks a great deal. 
					
					 Decrying the stand clarified by the DPRK to adhere to the line of pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force simultaneously to cope with the increasing nuclear threat of the U.S., the group jabbered that "the north should dismantle its nukes and opt for changes" and "the line is not helpful to the inhabitants in the north at all."
					
					 As fair-minded world public opinion unanimously recognizes, the DPRK's nukes serve as a treasured sword for protecting the destiny of the country and the nation from the U.S. threat of nuclear war and a national treasure for reunified Korea. 
					
					 It is quite natural for the DPRK to have had access to nukes and bolstered up them to protect its dignity and the security of the nation under the situation where the U.S. nuclear threat persists.
					
					 If the nuclear issue on the peninsula is to find a fair solution, it is necessary to defuse the U.S. nuclear threat which spawned the nuclear issue, force it to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and make its aggressor forces pull out of south Korea taking with them all nuclear weapons. 
					
					 It is the height of ridicule for Park and her group to take issue with the above-said line of the DPRK this or that way, bereft of any elementary common sense and reason. 
					
					 "Demand of the international community" touted by the puppet regime is nothing but the brigandish one of the U.S., its master. "Trend of the times" on its lips is no more than the anti-DPRK conspiratorial racket of such followers of the U.S. as the puppet group. 
					
					 The Park group makes much fuss about somebody's "changes" whenever an opportunity presents itself. This is nothing but sheer sophism intended to force the DPRK to divert from the roads of independence, Songun and socialism and realize its scenario for aggression in league with the U.S.
					
					 It is none other than Park and her group, servants of the U.S., who should face up to the trend of the times and come to their senses. 
					
					 The U.S. is now driving the south Korean puppet group to use it as a shock force in the war of aggression, making it bound to the military alliance more tightly and placing it deep under "nuclear umbrella" in a bid to realize the scenario for world domination.
					
					 Poor, indeed, is the south Korean puppet group trying hard to please its U.S. master, ballyhooing about "closer south Korea-U.S. alliance", unaware of the serious harm done even to its heart by the U.S.
					
					 Park and her group would be well advised to mind their own business before talking nonsense about someone.
					
					 If they are not willing to utter proper words in this bright world, they better shut their mouths.
					
					 The Park group would be well advised to stop making reckless remarks, paying heed to the just criticism and proper warning made by the DPRK, though belatedly. They should behave themselves if they want to escape a miserable end.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Landing Exercise against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Landing Exercise against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The puppet south Korean navy and marine corps are staging a madcap landing exercise simulating an attack on the DPRK on the coast of Phohang, North Kyongsang Province and in waters off it, according to south Korean KBS.
					 This was announced by the puppet warmongers on Friday.
					
					 Involved in the saber-rattling which will last till October 12 are at least 10 warships of the navy such as landing ships and destroyers, more than 20 planes and huge armed forces including over 3 000-strong marine corps.
					
					 One battalion of the Third Division of the U.S. Marines is to take part in the drill.
					
					 The puppet warmongers are increasing the grave danger of war, rushing headlong into inciting extreme confrontation by clinging to the coattails of their U.S. master.

articles.title: S. Korean Anti-Reunification Forces' Challenge under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Anti-Reunification Forces' Challenge under Fire
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan will take the lead in the nationwide struggle for meeting the challenges of the anti-reunification forces under the uplifted banner of the inter-Korean joint declaration, firmly convinced that the cause of national reunification is sure to triumph as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, said this in a statement issued on Friday on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The October 4 declaration along with the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is a reunification programme common to the nation in the new century and a landmark for independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The Koreans in Japan, too, warmly supported and hailed the publication of the October 4 declaration and dynamically joined in the nationwide struggle for implementing it as it marked another event in the nation's history which put the June 15 era of reunification on a higher level.
					
					 The Koreans have steadfastly advanced along the road of reunification despite of turns and twists. This is thanks to the inter-Korean joint declarations, landmarks for reunification and signposts of hope.
					
					 It is the unshakable faith and will of the Koreans in Japan to advance
					
					along the road of reunification and patriotism, holding higher the 
					
					banner of the June 15 declaration.
					
					 However, the inter-Korean relations are inching close to an uncontrollable crisis again due to the frantic confrontation rackets of the south Korean puppet conservative group quite contrary to the aspiration and desire of the fellow countrymen for reconciliation, unity and reunification.
					
					 The present reality clearly indicates that there can be neither peace on the Korean Peninsula nor the development of the inter-Korean relations without the implementation of the inter-Korean joint declarations.
					
					 We will make the enthusiasm to implement the joint declarations grow stronger among the Koreans in Japan from all walks of life and boost solidarity and alliance with the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and overseas in the idea of "By our nation itself" and thus make a tangible contribution to ushering in the second June 15 era of reunification by the concerted efforts of all Koreans, concluded the statement

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Teacher Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Suppressing Teacher Union
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea on Wednesday protested against the puppet authorities for denying the legitimacy of the organization, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The union termed the demand of the Ministry of Employment and Labor for excluding those discharged from the union illegal.
					
					 Condemning the regime for trying to obliterate the union, it lodged a formal complaint against Pang Ha Nam, minister of Employment and Labor, before the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office.

articles.title: Measles Occur in Kyonggi Province, S. Korea
articles.content:
Measles Occur in Kyonggi Province, S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Measles broke out in some areas of south Korea including Uijongbu and Phochon, south Korean CBS reported on Wednesday.
					 8 children were confirmed to have been infected with measles, according to the report.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Getting Hell Bent on Moves for War against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Getting Hell Bent on Moves for War against DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on Thursday released a commentary denouncing the south Korean puppet group for getting hell bent on the moves for igniting a war against the DPRK.
					 The commentary recalled that the south Korean chief executive, speaking at the ceremony marking "Day of ROK Army" on Tuesday, blared that the south will bolter up powerful deterrence till the north abandons nuclear weapons, blaming the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia on the "nuclear development of the north".
					
					 This was prompted by her ignorance of the basic reason of the nuclear issue on the peninsula, it noted, and went on:
					
					 As everybody knows, the nuclear issue on the peninsula spawned by the U.S. which introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea.
					
					 Had the U.S. neither introduced nuclear weapons into south Korea nor staged nuclear war maneuvers against Pyongyang, the DPRK would not have made nuclear weapons.
					
					 In order to remove the danger of war the U.S. nuclear weapons have to be withdrawn from south Korea, to begin with.
					
					 The remarks made by the south Korean chief executive are very dangerous as they antagonize the DPRK, foster confrontation with it and agitate a war.
					
					 If Park Geun Hye continues to antagonize fellow countrymen and escalate confrontation, she will be judged by the entire nation, which ardently desires for independent reunification by implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, and be recorded in history as a despicable criminal who was ousted, not serving out a full term, the commentary warned.

articles.title: U.S. Nuclear Carrier Enters Pusan Port of S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Nuclear Carrier Enters Pusan Port of S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Nuclear carrier George Washington belonging to the 7th Fleet of the Navy of the U.S. imperialists aggression forces entered the base of the south Korean Navy operation command in Pusan on Friday.
					 Accompanying it were guided-missile cruiser and destroyer belonging to the carrier flotilla.
					
					 It was reported that George Washington with more than 70 latest aircraft including strategic bombers and early warning plane aboard will be involved in the joint naval maneuvers with the puppet forces from Oct. 8.
					
					 The carrier called "floating military operation base" used to join in U.S.-south Korea joint exercises for a war against the DPRK, kicking up war hysteria.
					
					 The warmongers are working hard to bring the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula, blatantly challenging the DPRK's efforts for dialogue and peace with confrontation and war moves.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration Marked in Japan
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration Marked in Japan
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Osaka, Japan on Sept. 17 to demand the conclusion of a peace agreement between the DPRK and the U.S. and an early normalization of Japan-DPRK relations on the occasion of the 11th anniversary of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration.
					 Present there were officials of Japan, Osaka citizens and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 The Osaka co-representative of the Citizens Solidarity Demanding Earlier Normalization of the Relations between Japan and the DPRK said in a speech that the international solidarity movement is progressing apace to replace the Korean Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the agreement. He called for making this meeting as an occasion of setting right the Japanese government's policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The chief of the editorial board of a magazine gave a lecture on the theme of "Present situation on Korean Peninsula and prospect of normalization of Japan-DPRK relations" at the meeting.
					
					 The touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula is being defused thanks to the invariable peace policy of the DPRK and its sincere efforts, the chief noted.
					
					 Giving impressions of the DPRK, he said: The Korean people are full of hope for the future and optimism, stepping up economic construction. It is none other than the U.S. which persists in provocations for a war.
					
					 Japan's redemption of its past crimes is essential for improving relations with the DPRK. It is necessary for the international community to raise its voices to pressurize Japan to drop national chauvinism and opt for coming out at the talks for normalizing relations with the DPRK.
					
					 A written request to the Japanese prime minister was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Sweden
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Sweden
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "On Effecting a Drastic Turn in Land Management to Meet the Requirements for Building a Thriving Socialist Nation" was published in booklet by the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association and the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					 The work, published on April 27, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in land management. It also indicates the general orientation and tasks for face-lifting the land of the country as befitting a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 A releasing ceremony of the work took place in Stockholm on October 1.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK to Be Observed in Germany
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK to Be Observed in Germany
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A German preparatory committee for celebrating the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was inaugurated on September 28.
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to organize colorful political and cultural events and conduct brisk media activities introducing the stirring reality of the DPRK on the occasion of the birthday of the WPK which falls on October 10.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Supported Abroad
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The historic October 4 declaration is commanding ever stronger support and sympathy of the world public.
					 The Indian paper Tourism Era termed the points specified in the October 4 declaration realistic issues of key importance for developing inter-Korean relations and achieving independent reunification and peace and prosperity.
					
					 The declaration fully reflects the aspiration of the Korean nation desirous of discarding conception of confrontation and settling all the issues in line with reconciliation, cooperation and reunification, the paper added.
					
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement said the October 4 declaration was adopted thanks to leader Kim Jong Il who embodied patriotism at the highest level. The statement fully supported all the Korean people in their heroic struggle to drive the U.S. forces out of south Korea and thoroughly implement the October 4 declaration by the concerted efforts of the nation.
					
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization noted in a statement that the historic October 4 declaration is an action programme which indicates the way to be followed by the Korean people to achieve the national unity and country's reunification.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for Self-Reliance Studies said the adoption of the declaration helped the Korean nation have stronger confidence and optimism towards the country's reunification.
					
					 The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in an article posted on its website noted the division of Korea and the inter-Korean confrontation are products of the outside forces' policy of aggression.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in their joint statement said the Korean people would surely achieve the country's reunification under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who has successfully carried forward President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's ideas of national reunification and their exploits.

articles.title: America's War against People of Korea Is Historical Record of U.S. War Crimes
articles.content:
America's War against People of Korea Is Historical Record of U.S. War Crimes
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) --Michel Chossudovsky, professor of economics at the University of Ottawa, Canada who is also prominent author posted an article titled "America's War against the People of Korea Is the Historical Record of U.S. War Crimes" on the internet paper Global Research on September 22.
					 Recalling that the Korean Armistice Agreement (AA) was signed on July 27, 1953, the article said:
					
					 The U.S., a belligerent party, has consistently posed a war threat to the DPRK for over six decades despite the conclusion of the AA.
					
					 It abused the UN Charter for using the AA for justifying its military presence in south Korea, still posing a military threat to the DPRK.
					
					 It has pursued a policy of war, not peace.
					
					 Citing the concrete facts to prove that the Korean war was launched according to the carefully worked out U.S. scenario, the article noted that the U.S. has worked hard to politically isolate the DPRK and destabilize its economy for the past six decades.
					
					 The U.S. has also stood in the way of Korea's reunification, it noted, and continued:
					
					 It put the whole political system in south Korea under its control. The U.S. military presence in south Korea exercised predominant influence on its economic and financial policy.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies have waged numerous wars and military interventions in all major regions of the world in the course of what is euphemistically called "post war era." But the U.S. is upheld as the guardian of democracy and world peace.
					
					 The lie becomes the truth. Realities are turned upside down. History is rewritten.
					
					 Since the end of the Korean war, U.S. led propaganda--funneled into south Korean news chain--has relentlessly contributed to fomenting conflict and divisiveness between north and south Korea, presenting the DPRK as a threat to the security of south Korea.
					
					 The disgusting "theory of threat from north Korea" mars the conception that Korea is one and the same nation with one history.
					
					 Disclosing the fact that the U.S. has worked hard to realize its strategy for world domination since the Korean war, the article went on:
					
					 What is important is that many people in the U.S. and the West began to understand the U.S., not the DPRK, is the threat to global peace.
					
					 The DPRK and the U.S. are in state of war.
					
					 If the U.S. uses nuclear weapons against the DPRK, south Korea will also suffer. The U.S. military operation designers know well about this fact.
					
					 What should be stressed before mentioning the negotiations for a peace agreement is that the U.S. is not a true ally of south Korea.
					
					 Withdrawal of the U.S. forces is prerequisite to peace agreement.

articles.title: Statement of Policy Department of DPRK NDC Aired by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Statement of Policy Department of DPRK NDC Aired by Foreign Media 
						
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign media reported the statement issued by a spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK which strongly warned Park Geun Hye and her group under the grave prevailing situation in which the hard-won atmosphere of dialogue and peaceful environment are turning into phase of confrontation and tensions.
					 ITAR-TASS said that the spokesman for the DPRK NDC Policy Department in a statement denounced Park Geun Hye and the present ruling quarters of south Korea for chilling the hard-won atmosphere of reconciliation and cooperation on the Korean Peninsula. It reported as follows:
					
					 No sooner had she taken office as "president" than she dared slander the dignity and social system in the DPRK, blaring that the "north should be led to abandon the line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force and to make a proper choice of change", the statement said. It added that the army and people of the DPRK will invariably advance their own way to attain the goals set by them to build a prosperous country, by maintaining the line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.  
					
					 Phoenix Satellite TV, Hong Kong, China reported as follows:
					
					 The spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK NDC in a statement warned south Korea that it will be little short of digging its own grave if it gets hell-bent on forcing the DPRK to lay down nuclear weapons with an aim at overthrow of the social system in collusion with outsiders under the pretext of leading Pyongyang to "change".
					
					 The nuclear weapons possessed by the army and people of the DPRK are powerful deterrence to prevent the nuclear disaster to be inflicted by the U.S. and a treasured sword common to the nation to defend the destiny of the country and the nation, it added.
					
					 The content of the statement was also aired by Chinese Xinhua News Agency, South China Morning Post of Hong Kong, Voice of Russia, Ekho Moskvi Radio of Russia, Russian paper Moskovskiye Novosti, VOA, Kyodo, Tokyo Shimbun, AFP and the British newspaper Independent and several Russian internet websites.

articles.title: Nacion coreana recuerda 6 anos despues de publicada Declaracion de 4 de Octubre
articles.content:
Nacion coreana recuerda 6 anos despues de publicada Declaracion de 4 de Octubre
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la Cumbre Norte-Sur, celebrada el 4 de octubre de hace ahora 6 anos en Pyongyang, fue aprobada la Declaracion para el Desarrollo de las Relaciones Norte-Sur, la Paz y la Prosperidad. 
					Esto fue un acontecimiento historico que infundio un nuevo animo a la lucha nacional por la reunificacion de la patria y preparo el jalon por el cumplimiento de la causa del 15 de Junio. 
					
					Por la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre la era de reunificacion independiente acogio una nueva era dorada. 
					
					Desde entonces, todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar aceleraron con animo el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria y hasta ahora recuerdan aquellos dias despues de publicado este programa comun de la nacion. 
					
					Se realizaron las charlas de politicos, economicos, culturales, artistas, academicos, etc. y los dialogos multifaceticos entre ambas partes coreanas. 
					
					En el Sur de Corea tuvieron lugar las actividades propagandisticas y culturales de apoyo a la historica Cumbre Norte-Sur de Pyongyang y a la publicacion de la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					
					Las direcciones nortena y surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria y otras entidades del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar publicaron las declaraciones de apoyo a la declaracion mencionada y se levantaron para ejecutarla. 
					
					Se activaban cada dia mas las labores de reconciliacion y cooperacion.
					
					Al respecto, los medios surcoreanos publicaron los articulos como "Hacia la era de la paz y prosperidad destruyendo la barrera de desconfianza" y "La Declaracion del 4 de Octubre abre nueva pagina de la paz de Peninsula Coreana" estimando que "se ha preparado la base para la paz de la Peninsula Coreana". 
					
					En todas las partes del pais estremecian las aclamaciones de "!Somos uno!" y todos los integrantes de la nacion estaban esperando la reunificacion.
					
					Pero, la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak que conquisto el "poder" hablando de la necesidad de "rescatar 10 anos perdidos" nego totalmente la declaracion Norte-Sur desde el primer dia de su mandato. 
					
					Critico las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur como "producto de estrategia del Norte sobre el Sur de Corea" e insistio en que "hay que mantener con firmeza el principio en las relaciones intercoreanas aunque pase mucho tiempo" y que "es intolerable la reunificacion segun la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio". 
					
					Insulto el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" como "nacionalismo de estrecha vision" y "nacionalismo chovinista" y disparateo que "no se puede resolver con esto las relaciones Sur-Norte". E impidio completamente los actos de reunificacion por la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales. 
					
					Tambien pusieron obstaculos artificiales en los actos de reunificacion de las entidades civiles presentando pretextos injustos.
					
					El 15 de junio y el 4 de octubre de cada ano lanzo a los fulanos y menganos a la campana contra la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y llevo a la ruptura total todas las labores de cooperacion Norte-Sur por la coprosperidad nacional. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas en actual mandato tambien llevan las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase catastrofica preconizando el "enfrentamiento con dialogo". 
					
					Los 6 anos pasados despues de publicada la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre demuestran que los principios de relaciones intercoreanas y el punto de partida de la confianza estan en respetar y ejecutar la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre que sintetizan la aspiracion y demanda de la nacion. 
					
					La aspiracion de la nacion coreana a la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad no puede ser la victima de los vendepatrias. 
					
					Si la banda de Park Geun-hye sigue impidiendo la corriente nacional con la confrontacion fratricida, como lo hicieron sus antecedentes, sera condenada severamente por la historia.

articles.title: Inaugurada exposicion permanente de productos tecnicos agricolas
articles.content:
Inaugurada exposicion permanente de productos tecnicos agricolas
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- Como parte de la campana para elevar el nivel cientifico de la produccion agricola, fue inaugurada en esta capital la exposicion permanente de productos tecnicos agricolas. 
					En la exposicion enclavada en el municipio de Taesong se exhiben los productos quimicos agricolas, los medicamentos veterinarios, los aditamentos de piensos de ganados, las maquinas e implementos agricolas, los equipos de laboratorio, los libros cientifico-tecnicos de la rama, etc. 
					
					Atrajeron la atencion especial de los visitantes los articulos hechos introduciendo los exitos cientificos y tecnicos avanzados. 
					
					La exposicion tiene la mision de divulgar ampliamente a las unidades de produccion las tecnologias avanzadas y los productos desarrollados por los organos de investigacion cientifica de la rama agricola.

articles.title: Transcurre renidamente el torneo de futbol de categoria A
articles.content:
Transcurre renidamente el torneo de futbol de categoria A
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- Se tornan cada dia mas espectaculares los partidos de futbol de primera clase (de ambos sexos) del Campeonato Nacional que se desarrollan en el capitalino Estadio Kim Il Sung.
					En el partido masculino del dia 4 entre Hwaebul y Wolmido, el primero vencio por 3:0 a su rival.
					
					El 25 de Abril salio victorioso con el marcador 1:0 frente a Amnokgang.
					
					En el encuentro femenino entre 25 de Abril y Kalmaegi, las muchachas del primer grupo vencio por 2:0 a su rival. 
					
					Chongchongang y Hwangryongsan quedaron empatados por 2:2.
					
					En los juegos femeninos del dia 5, Myohyangsan vencio por 4:2 a Pyongyang y Sobaeksu y Mangyongbong resultaron empatados por 0:0.
					
					Continuan los partidos.
